caption: MCP Server
description: Describes the configuration for an MCP server.
name: mcp_server

url.caption: URL
url.description: URL of the server (for remote servers).

command.caption: Command
command.description: Executable or runtime command (for local servers).

env_vars.caption: Environment Variables
env_vars.description: List of environment variables such as tokens or API keys (for local servers).

headers.caption: Headers
headers.description: Request headers for the server authentication (non-sensitive).

scope.caption: Scope
scope.description: Scope of the server accessibility and sharing options.

prompts.caption: Prompts
prompts.description: List of prompts supported by the server.

resources.caption: Resources
resources.description: List of resources supported by the server.

tools.caption: Tools
tools.description: List of tools supported by the server.

subscribe.caption: The server can subscribe to events.

notify.caption: The server can notify on events.
